name: Desert Shopkeep
description:
This game is a submission to the Apocalypse Game Jam 2022 for the subtheme "Post-Apocalyptic Desert Madness".

It's a fast-paced management game that will keep you on your feet as you are doing your best to juggle survive in the desert, satisfying all your customers and fix broken machines.

The fullscreen resolution of the web embedded game is 1600 x 900.

Controls:

- Press LMB on an Item Bubble to take an Item
- Press RMB on the Item Bubble you took Items from to place them all back
- Press LMB on a Customer to give them the Items
- Look around with your Mouse
- Move around your Shop with the A and D buttons
- Drink Water from your water Dispenser on your Left
- Consolidate your Notebook on the Right if you need to know something

Stay hydrated! <3
